iana.template_text:
Date: Sun, 26 Jul 1998 19:54:10 -0700 (PDT)
From: Hiroyoshi Mori <mori&mm.rd.nttdata.co.jp>
To: iana&iana.org, mori&mm.rd.nttdata.co.jp
Subject: Request for MIME media type Application/Vendor Tree - vnd.

Name : Hiroyoshi Mori

E-mail : mori&mm.rd.nttdata.co.jp

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.anser-web-funds-transfer-initiation

Required parameters : None


Optional parameters : 
None


Encoding considerations : 
Since the encoded file may contain long lines or binary data, it should
be encoded as binary.


Security considerations : 
The security issues associated with this type have not been assessed.


Interoperability considerations : 
Intended for use only with ANSER-WEB Terminal Client.


Published specification : 
Not available


Applications which use this media : 
ANSER-WEB Terminal Client


Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : None
2. File extension(s) : fti
3. Macintosh file type code : None
ANSER-WEB system is intended to carry out banking services over the
Internet.  ANSER-WEB is a registered trademark of NTT DATA.
This MIME subtype is intended to perform as a trigger for Web browser
to launch the ANSER-WEB Terminal Client rather than specify transport
considerations.



Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Hiroyoshi Mori
2. E-mail : mori&mm.rd.nttdata.co.jp

Intended usage : Common 
This MIME subtype is intended to perform as a trigger for Web browser
to launch the ANSER-WEB Terminal Client.

Author/Change controller : Hiroyoshi Mori
NTT DATA Corp.
NTT DATA Mita Bldg.,
4-19-15, Mita,
Minato-ku, Tokyo 108-0073, Japan
